prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with coral-like features and a soft, round body.
I want to see a small aquatic Pokemon that resembles a colorful sea creature.
Generate a Pokemon that has a playful personality and lives in the ocean.
Make a cute, tiny Pokemon that has light colors and is surrounded by water.
Imagine a Pokemon with unique, spiky appendages and a friendly demeanor.
Design a water-type Pokemon that thrives in coral reefs and has a smooth texture.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that resembles a sea coral and has white and pink colors.
